name: Mirror Of Colorness VR
description:
Our world is grey... lifeless... however you can change that!

 Conquer Dungeon of Colors!
Gather new colors, and learn of their hidden power!
Find legendary Mirror of Colorness and restore the colors to the world!

Mirror of Colorness is a VR adventure game,

in it, you will explore ancient ruins, solve puzzles and face many dangers.
The game has unique colors changing system.
Each color grand you different power and you also can see only one color at a time.

Get ready for a great adventure in the world of Mirror of Colorness!
